trans-unit.source: An activity that demarcates a transaction boundary.
trans-unit.target: En aktivitet som demarcates en transaksjon grense.

trans-unit.source: When this activity begins executing, a new <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> is started if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Når denne aktiviteten begynner å kjøre en ny <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>startes hvis det ikke finnes allerede.</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>

trans-unit.source: The transaction commits when the activity and all other participants in the transaction have completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Transaksjonen skriver når aktiviteten og alle andre deltakere i transaksjonen som er fullført.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> activity member of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> activity that is the child of a TransactionScope will not execute if an unhandled exception propagates past the TransactionScope boundary.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A>aktivitetsmedlem av en <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch>aktivitet som underordnede for et TransactionScope utføres ikke hvis et ubehandlet unntak overfører forbi grenselinjen TransactionScope.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the workflow should be aborted if the transaction aborts.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som angir om arbeidsflyten skal avbrutt hvis transaksjonen avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er angitt under kjøring en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow should be aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflyten skal bli avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir aktiviteten som er planlagt når den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref> utfører.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er angitt under kjøring en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitet som er planlagt når den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref> utfører.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref> for denne <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er angitt under kjøring en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*>for denne <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref> skal serialiseres.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*>for denne <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref> skal serialiseres.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.TimeSpan> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir tidsavbruddsperioden for transaksjonen som brukes for dette <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er angitt under kjøring en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir tidsavbruddsperioden for transaksjonen som brukes for dette <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>
